description: Enable AI models to interact with MySQL databases through a standardized interface. Perform database operations such as querying, executing statements, listing tables, and describing table structures securely and efficiently. Simplify database management with automatic connection handling and prepared statement support.

capabilities.name: query
capabilities.description: Execute a SELECT query,can not get table structure,use describe_table tool to get table structure

capabilities.name: execute
capabilities.description: Execute an INSERT, UPDATE, or DELETE query

capabilities.name: list_tables
capabilities.description: List all tables in the database

capabilities.name: show_statement
capabilities.description: Execute a SHOW statement (e.g., SHOW STATUS, SHOW VARIABLES)

capabilities.name: explain
capabilities.description: Analyze SQL query performance using EXPLAIN
